paragrafi.codicePlSql:
select * from 
(SELECT --Oli.X_ASSET_INT"Codice Piano Tariffario ordine"EG_ID_OLD, --Oli.port_valid_prod_id, Oli.PROD_PORT_ID,
          x_flg_stacco_be,
           --Orders.X_ALTRO_OLO_FLG Olo, Orders.ACCNT_ID, --Oli.root_order_item_id, Ord_Type.NAME Order_Type, OLi.QTY_REQ,
           --OrdersX.ATTRIB_12 "WIN Data DRR", Orders.DISCNT_REASON "WIN Tipo dismissione ULL", Orders.HOLD_REASON "WIN Causale",
           --OLIX.CPS_FLG, --Oli.root_order_item_id, Cas.row_id, Cas.sr_num, Cas.SR_STAT_ID, CTR.target_ou_id IdCliente,
           --CTR.PRI_WF_PROC_NAME "WIN Tipo Servizio", Orders.sr_id, --Cas.pr_symptom_cd as Tripletta, --Orders.X_CVP_FLG,
           --Oli.root_order_item_id, --CTR.legal_con_id "Referente Contratto PP",
           --OLIX.ATTRIB_41 "WIN Piano Tariffario", Orders.CCV_NUMBER "Codice Piano Tariffario ordine",
           --Orders.X_UPSELLING_TYPE "Upselling Type", OrdersX.ATTRIB_43 "WIN Offerta PP", OrdersX.ATTRIB_07 "WIN Offerta",
           --OLIX.ATTRIB_45 "WIN Ref Spedizione Id", OLIX.X_ATTRIB_48 "WIN Ref Fix Id PP", OLIX.X_ATTRIB_49 "WIN Ref Fix 2 Id PP", --> Referente a livello P/S
           Orders.row_id,
           Orders.order_num Ord,
           Orders.PAR_ORDER_ID Parent,
           CTR.agree_num Contratto,
           Product.TYPE,
           Product.sub_type_cd,
           DECODE (LEVEL,
                   1, Product.NAME,
                   2, '|__ ' || Product.NAME,
                   3, '    |__ ' || Product.NAME,
                   4, '       |__ ' || Product.NAME,
                   5, '          |__ ' || Product.NAME,
                   '             |__ ' || Product.NAME)
              Componente,
           Oli.ROW_ID OLI_ROW_ID,
           --Oli.X_ASSET_INTEG_ID_OLD "WIN ENT Asset Link",
           Oli.SERVICE_NUM ServiceID,
           Oli.ACTION_CD Action,
           Product.part_num,                      --Oli.CUSTOMIZED_FLG Config,
           Orders.status_cd StatoOrder,
           Oli.status_cd StatoOLI,
           Oli.ASSET_INTEG_ID,               --Oli.SHIP_CON_ID "ID venditore",
           Oli.PROD_ID,
           Oli.cfg_state_cd,
           Oli.SERV_ACCNT_ID "ID SEDE",
           Oli.X_SEDE_OLD,
           --OLIX.ATTRIB_34 CDF_RC, OLIX.ATTRIB_35 CDF_NRC, OLIX.ATTRIB_36 CDF_USG, OLIX.ATTRIB_37 CDF_PERS,
           OLIX.ATTRIB_40 SottoStatoOLI,
           Oli.PAR_ORDER_ITEM_ID ParentOLI,
           Oli.ORDER_ID,
           Oli.created_BY,
           Oli.created,
           Sottomissione.submit_dt,
           Oli.last_upd,
           Oli.integration_id,
           Orders.CRDHOLDER_NAME "WIN Piano Tariffario",
           OrdersX.X_ATTRIB_68,
           OrdersX.X_ATTRIB_63 "Codice Change",
           OrdersX.X_ATTRIB_64,
           OLIX.ATTRIB_34,
           OLIX.ATTRIB_35,
           OLIX.ATTRIB_36 BA_USG,
           OLIX.ATTRIB_37                                  --> Billing Account
      FROM siebel.S_ORDER_ITEM Oli,
           siebel.S_PROD_INT Product,
           siebel.S_ORDER Orders,
           siebel.S_ORDER_X OrdersX,
           siebel.S_ORDER_ITEM_X OLIX,
           siebel.S_ORDER_TYPE Ord_Type,
           siebel.S_DOC_AGREE CTR,
           SIEBEL.S_ORDER_DTL Sottomissione,
           siebel.s_srv_req Cas
     WHERE     Oli.ORDER_ID(+) = Orders.ROW_ID
           AND Oli.ROW_ID = OLIX.ROW_ID(+)
           AND CTR.ROW_ID = Orders.AGREE_ID
           AND Oli.PROD_ID = Product.ROW_ID
           AND Orders.ROW_ID = OrdersX.PAR_ROW_ID
           AND Ord_Type.ROW_ID = Orders.ORDER_TYPE_ID
           --AND CTR.agree_num = '1000888879405'
           --and Oli.action_cd = 'Modify'
           --and CTR.target_ou_id = '1-1D5B-50'        --> ********* ID CLIENTE ****************
           --and Product.sub_type_cd in ('DATLA', 'WLINE')
           AND Oli.status_cd NOT IN ('Eliminato')--, 'Completato')
           --and Oli.root_order_item_id in ('1-JCOXF6', '')
           --and (Oli.row_id in ('1-4MSIQE','1-4MSIQ6') or Oli.par_order_item_id in ('1-4MSIQE','1-4MSIQ6'))
           --and Oli.asset_integ_id in ('100046555')
           AND Orders.sr_id = Cas.row_id(+)
--           and asset_integ_id = '1175505051721'
           --and Oli.SERVICE_NUM is not null    --> *********** SERVICE ID VALORIZZATO ************
           AND Sottomissione.par_row_id(+) = Orders.ROW_ID
--and product.name IN ('SERVIZIO VOCE')  -->> *********** NOME PRODOTTO *************
START WITH Product.TYPE = 'PRD' AND Orders.order_num IN 
(--'1-620705145414'
'1-620490982644'
) --> in ADSL Aziende
--and Orders.row_id = '7-1YSSNSB'
--and Oli.root_order_item_id = '1-85MT4Z'
CONNECT BY PRIOR Oli.row_id = Oli.par_order_item_id
)
--where statoorder <>'Chiuso' and statooli<>'Completato'

select NUMERAZIONE
FROM NUM_PL_COMM 
where IDCLIENTE = 'kk'
and upper(STATO) = ''
AND NUMERAZIONE IS NOT NULL
